titles.title: To designate the Federal Courthouse located at 316 North 26th Street in Billings, Montana, as the "James F. Battin Federal Courthouse".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Economic Development.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended) by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Transportation. H. Rept. 105-617.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 222.

action.text: Mr. Kim moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Environment and Public Works

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Chafee without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 693.

bill.summary: 8/4/1998--Passed House amended. Designates the U.S. Courthouse located at 316 North 26th Street, Billings, Montana, as the James F. Battin United States Courthouse.
